Name: Wikinews - weakly aligned multilingual pararell sentence datasets
Description: Multilingual aligned news articles from WikiNews in 34 languages.
Paper Title: Linear Cross-Lingual Mapping of Sentence Embeddings
Abstract: Semantics of a sentence is defined with much less ambiguity than semantics of a single word, and we assume that it should be better preserved by translation to another language. If multilingual sentence embeddings intend to represent sentence semantics, then the similarity between embeddings of any two sentences must be invariant with respect to translation. Based on this suggestion, we consider a simple linear cross-lingual mapping as a possible improvement of the multilingual embeddings.
